subject: Dear,
body:
Dear,
We write to inform you the interceptions of your funds valued at
Eighteen Million United State Dollars (US$18,000, 000.00) by our
International Monitoring Funds Unit (I.M.F), After the discovery of
the said wire transfer from RIA Money Transfer  to your Name and
required that your comply with the release condition stated hereunder.
Pursuant the information received from the authority with regards to
the funds investigation has been granted and the (I.M.F))  has been
keeping a close eye on the funds movement from the origin and our
(I.M.F)) policy on payment of funds as stipulated in section
48,sub-section 21a paragraph III of the 2006 Acts that for
international funds payment in favor of a third party does not allow
an individual with such huge sum of money without proper declaration
and clearance of funds hence, we request for all the document that
back up the funds as follow
Anti-Money Laundering Clearance certificate Anti-Drug Clearance Upon
receipt of the above for our perusal, we shall grant the funds
reflection / delivery into your nominated Information with Ria Money
Transfer ,However,though our policy is in accordance with the
multi-lateral agreement by the (IMF), the united state and European
Union, Asia Continent considering the issue of September 11,2001
bombing of the world trade center (WTC) and London bombing that
trigger the treat to life and prosperity of every individual, Thereby
given raise to adequate Security alert System. Nevertheless, 
you are
required to pay the sum of Five Hundred and Fifty Dollars ($550) for
the required two  Documents; otherwise we shall commence investigation
as regard the source of funds and its legitimacy.
Note that the (TWO DOCUMENT) must to be secured from the US Ambassador
office in Porto Novo  and like we said before the Two document is
going to cost you the sum of $550 dollars for the issuing of the (TWO
DOCUMENTS), because that is the only office that will issue you the
original copies of Those (TWO CERTIFICATES) of this funds. However 
we
shall be waiting for your swift compliance prior to when we shall
commence our investigation as you stand the chance of forfeiting your
funds and face arrest for attempted money laundering.
We shall be waiting for your swift response
THANKS FOR YOUR CO-OPERATION.
Mr.Johnson Friend

subject: Re: Dear,
body:
Hello Friend,

Thank you for your detailed message. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about this large sum of money associated with my name. 

I'm curious, how did you come across this information? And why is it that the funds are being held by RIA Money Transfer? 

You mentioned some documents that need to be provided for clearance. Could you please elaborate on what these documents are and why they are necessary?

Also, I noticed that there's a fee of Five Hundred and Fifty Dollars for these documents. Is there any way to waive or reduce this fee? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thomas
